name: Snail Race 1
description:
With everything crazy going on, I can only think to the snail and how their slow pace is also a metaphor for a simpler life.

So I took those snails and made them race against each other, bc if we can't be happy they can't either!

https://snail.racecraft.cf

By @itszn (RET2)
flag: flag{I bet you abused my poor, innocent, sessions huh >:(}
